survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Mobile Banking App Features Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users about their satisfaction with various features of their mobile banking app to enhance user experience and functionality.

questions.question_text: How often do you use your mobile banking app?
questions.client_notes: This question helps establish the frequency of app usage, which can be correlated with satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How often do you use your mobile banking app?

questions.question_text: Which of the following mobile banking app features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Identifies key features that drive user engagement. 'Other' option captures features not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice checkboxes with an optional open-text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which of the following mobile banking app features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the overall performance of your mobile banking app? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
questions.client_notes: A standard Likert scale question to gauge overall satisfaction.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice radio buttons with a 5-point scale

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the overall performance of your mobile banking app? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your mobile banking app?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback for potential enhancements.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your mobile banking app?

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any technical issues while using the mobile banking app in the past 6 months?
questions.client_notes: Helps identify the prevalence of technical issues affecting user experience.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any technical issues while using the mobile banking app in the past 6 months?
